title: Lincoln's WARNING #100024: Housing Market Concerns
script: Housing Market Concerns! Let me tell you something - I seen a lot of BULLSHIT in my time, but THIS?! These clowns got mansions talking about YOUR privilege! Private jets preaching about YOUR carbon! THE NERVE! The muhfuckin AUDACITY! QR code NOW! Housing Market Concerns? Bread and circuses for the modern age. Keep you scared, keep you spending. That's the formula. See through it. Bitcoin below.
